user.description: Please enter your [Sinch Service API]({token_url}) details that has been created per the [instructions]({component_url}).

init.description: Please enter some defaults for your Sinch SMS notification service.

data_description.sender: May be a valid MSISDN number, or a short string (max 11 characters).
data_description.default_recipients: One or multiple valid MSISDN numbers. Use a comma or newline to separate entries.

migration_notify_service.title: Migration {integration_title} notify service
migration_notify_service.description:
The {integration_title} notify service for `{name}` was migrated to a `notify` entity, and configuring {integration_title} using YAML is being removed.

Your existing YAML configuration has been imported into the UI automatically, including API key.

Remove the `{domain}` configuration from your configuration.yaml, update any automations that use the `notify.notify` service to use the `notify.send_message` and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.
